title: Brother Messy, Brother Neat
description: We love our families, but they can drive us crazy. In Brother Messy, Brother Neat, wo brothers are as different as they can be. One likes everything neat and tidy, and the other prefers creative messes. What happens when they are forced to share a room? Your students will want to find out, and you will want to use this opportunity to teach them about problem and solution in a story.
reviewWords: messy, neat, organize, promised, rules, slob
